team13.cmput301.recipefinder.activities

Class CreateRecipeActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • team13.cmput301.recipefinder.activities.CreateRecipeActivity

  • public class CreateRecipeActivity
extends Activity
    Activity that allows users to create a recipe. The user is allowed to attach one or more photos to the recipe, a name for the recipe, the instructions, the ingredients, and the description. CMPUT301 W13 T13
    Author:
    Han (Jim) Wen, Jessica Yuen, Shen Wei Liao, Fangyu Li

      • ingredientListClicked

        public void ingredientListClicked(View view)
        Called on listing ingredients button click. Expands the list of ingredients the user added.
        Parameters:
        view - The view where the button is

      • instructionListClicked

        public void instructionListClicked(View view)
        Called on listing instructions button click. Expands the list of instructions the user added.
        Parameters:
        view - The view where the button is

      • createClicked

        public void createClicked(View view)
        Saves and displays the recipe when save button is clicked. Only does so if all necessary fields are filled out.
        Parameters:
        view - Current activity view

      • exitClicked

        public void exitClicked(View view)
        Return to previous activity on exit button click
        Parameters:
        view - The view where the exit button is located
